column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My only minor boo
column2: is to the fact that they recently tightened their member policy
column3: and that now the membership card holder also has to show an ID to get inside w/up to only 2 guests
column4: and that you can't just hand it off to a friend anymore. Still
column5: I guess enough people abused that old policy with how many people were trying to get in when a member handed the card off to a group of people to go inside
column6: that it likely ruined it for all members.
